spec_data.Name: perl-MooseX-Role-TraitConstructor
spec_data.Description:
This role allows you to easily accept a traits argument (or another name)
into your constructor, which will easily mix roles into an anonymous class
before construction, much like Moose::Meta::Attribute does.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:00:25 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Wrapper for new that can accept a traits parameter
